The exterior of this egg-shaped brass censer is polished to a mirror-like sheen. Several rings are attached to its sides at regular intervals. The top of the censer's lid is decorated with a pair of intertwining snakes.

Activateâ€”Light Incense 2 (aura, manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Cost incense worth at least 5 gp

Effect A piping, reddish smoke pours from the censer in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20]. You choose whether the smoke causes the target's blood to turn extremely hot or transmutes to poison; the smoke deals your choice of fire or poison damage. Each living creature that's in the area or enters it attempts a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] saving throw, then becomes temporarily immune for 1 hour.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature breathes in a small amount of the poisonous smoke and takes @Damage[2d6[persistent,fire]] or @Damage[2d6[persistent,acid]] damage.

Failure The creature gulps down a lungful of the smoke, taking @Damage[4d6[persistent,fire]] or @Damage[4d6[persistent,acid]] damage and becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} until the persistent damage ends.

Critical Failure The creature inhales a large amount of the smoke, taking @Damage[6d6[persistent,fire]] or @Damage[6d6[persistent,acid]] damage and becoming @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3} until the persistent damage ends.
